body:
I'm trying top run an annual daylight simulation and getting the error: "Major Input Missing". I have Radiance installed. Which input seems to be missing?



Thank you!

replies.body: This is a warning. You're missing one of the required inputs. Check them one by one and make sure they are provided and are not None.

Yes. Ashish, Please find attached and compare with your def. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/N28dJy6YSTJUBbkqyOAsDQVSJ9xNFedcy8yn4jHJkQa6Vioj6LKYWUlby9CSyX5LAdIUMFeMzp2Ysaj573Lvd2iNLf7vmrd-/Capture.PNG) best, Omid.

Thanks Omid and Mostapha;

I realized I had missed extracting a single item from the list of zone programs which meant it was running the daylight simulations for all connected zone programs!
